Package Maze

Class Maze

java.lang.Object
Maze.Maze
Direct Known Subclasses:
AdultMaze, ChildrenMaze
public abstract class Maze extends Object
Stores essential maze data and communicates with other classes.

    Constructor
    Description
    Maze(int numRow, int numColumn)
    When constructed a maze needs to have a specified size, with the maximum size being 100x100 (100 rows and 100 columns).

    drawSolution()
    Takes a generated maze's solution and creates a visual representation of the most optimal path from the start point to the end point.

    getMazeDetails()
    Gets a mazes details.
    abstract String[]
    setMazeDetails()
    Sets the mazes details including author, title, date created last edited and whether the maze is complete and ready to be exported.

  • Constructor Details

    • Maze

      public Maze(int numRow, int numColumn)
      When constructed a maze needs to have a specified size, with the maximum size being 100x100 (100 rows and 100 columns).
      Parameters:
      numRow - The number of rows the maze will have
      numColumn - The number of columns the maze will have

  • Method Details

    • drawMaze

      public abstract void drawMaze()
      Takes a generated maze's data and creates a visual representation of maze.

      public abstract void drawSolution()
      Takes a generated maze's solution and creates a visual representation of the most optimal path from the start point to the end point.
